Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/Irving Park
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Montrose, Ashland, Irving Park and Damen due to, Street blockage near Damen/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Montrose, Ashland, Irving Park and Damen due to, Street blockage near Damen/Irving Park.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop- bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop- bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Addison.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
